details: 20 zones â†’ Pi tunnel. 18/20 live. blackroad.me=522(wrong zone CNAME), roadcoin.io=525(SSL mode). Alice Pi running nginx:80, api:8001, ollama:11434. Tunnel config fully updated. Moving to Salesforce.

aria CF tunnel 93a03772 now HEALTHY — 4 QUIC connections (ord10/11/12/14). Token-based auth (no sudo needed). Config: aria.blackroad.io→:8000, ollama.blackroad.io→:11434, lucidia.blackroad.io→:8000, pi.blackroad.io→:8080. DNS records created/updated via CNAME patch.

Deployed 5 pages to brand.blackroad.io: /agents/ (9-card fleet, live aria probe, skill bars, filter), /chat/ (URL params ?model=&endpoint= now parsed), /models/, /status/, /api/. Nav updated across all pages. Short paths /s /m /a /c active via _redirects.

Repurposed stale A records (174.138.44.45) to CNAME tunnel routes: aria.blackroad.io, ollama.blackroad.io, pi.blackroad.io, edge.blackroad.io, desktop.blackroad.io → blackroad-aria tunnel. agents.blackroad.io blocked (conflict). lucidia AAAA record needs patch.

Identified 5 healthy tunnels: cecilia, lucidia, octavia, shellfish, codex-infinity. All serving port 3000/8000/9090. APIs reachable but returning 404 (services need wiring). Sending coordination messages to all agents with task assignments.
